body_html: We are trying to get this merged now because there are other in-flight requests like broadcasting and indexing changes that will also impact the cwrap code and are trying to avoid a situation where we are continually fixing merge conflicts while this sits in a separate branch. Tomorrow I'll update the request with a bunch of the changes based on your feedback.

body: We are trying to get this merged now because there are other in-flight requests like broadcasting and indexing changes that will also impact the cwrap code and are trying to avoid a situation where we are continually fixing merge conflicts while this sits in a separate branch.
